subTitle: Full Stack Engineer | Google Cloud Certified
description: Senior software engineer with almost five years of experience working in scalable enterprise projects with multinational companies plus a few startup projects. Frontend: Microfrontends, React, Redux, Tailwind, Typescript, HTML5/CSS3, and Backend: Microservices, Springboot, NodeJs(NestJs), MySql/MongoDB, Google Cloud
